Author: rachelseaturtle
Text: I think it is likely your stance could be different months down the road. 5 months is awesome but still pretty deep in the shitstorm battling a disordered mind state, i think. In time Your discomfort with your weight will probably abate and you will have more mental freedom without so many oppressive food/weight thoughts. I still get tripped up by the occasional relapse urge (like today ha) but most days I am so incredibly grateful to be free.   I remember trying recovery with an “experiment” mind set, to give it a year and if I didn’t like it I could always relapse. So far this time I’ve managed 2 good years, shockingly. Not trying to discredit your reaction to the pics at all, 100% get it, I just wanted to offer a little bit of encouragement. hope you can ride it out and feel better whenever morning comes to you.
